snippet.textDisplay: Sometimes women can be the very opposite of their public face.   I knew a professor,  loved by her students, who threw a bowl at her nanny.   And broke it on her.  The nanny had cleaned and chopped some vegetables as asked...but had chopped them too fine.  The "sweetest" lady at our church DELIBERATELY shut her daughter's hand in their car door because her daughter was fussing with her brother over the fact that he had almost accidentally done that.   I knew the nanny and the kids of the first lady and I was a witness at the second incident.   When I think about those incidents, along with the MANY times my own mother lost control, I find it very sad that the person who so often gets the blame in such a situation is actually the victim.
snippet.textOriginal: Sometimes women can be the very opposite of their public face.   I knew a professor,  loved by her students, who threw a bowl at her nanny.   And broke it on her.  The nanny had cleaned and chopped some vegetables as asked...but had chopped them too fine.  The "sweetest" lady at our church DELIBERATELY shut her daughter's hand in their car door because her daughter was fussing with her brother over the fact that he had almost accidentally done that.   I knew the nanny and the kids of the first lady and I was a witness at the second incident.   When I think about those incidents, along with the MANY times my own mother lost control, I find it very sad that the person who so often gets the blame in such a situation is actually the victim.

snippet.textDisplay:
A big thank to all my fans!what will my name and career be without all of your love and support?
Amidst my darkest days you all stood by me,I don't have all the time in the world to reply,but I do read all your heartwarming comments and truly appreciate all. it's because the of love and so I decided to put a smile on the face of my fans by going through my old posts on my official page and hitting up random fans,so I can get to relate with my fans better through discussion of depth and humour, listening to compliment and criticism on my career walk.
Kindly text me on Hangouts here is my email
Johnnydepp5004@gmail.com
God bless you and to thank you once again for the love and support ❤️❤️❤️♥️♥️
